column4: okay, someone good with GFX 3D want to explain this to me... I reinstalled Ubuntu and thought I'd try run my TRON (armagetronad) and WOW, finally, 40fps at 1920x1200 with eerything turned on
yet I run GLX gears and it -sucks-
I know - but it's at least /partially/ representitive
well, it's still strange that when one goes well the other doesn't
using the free driver in both cases?
afaik, yes :\  any way of determining which is installed?
the version of fglrx included in feisty doesn't support the 9250 anymore
well, it's all very curious then isn't it
I did /try/ to install flgx using the ATi site's driver package.. but it didn't even get started since there was a problem in one of the scripts
just be happy it decided to work so well :P
just thinking it'll come back later and bite me when I have to do another install :D
then I'll be cussing once more
